divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a friend from Ohio has been in contact now for over 3 months what ever he is seeing off of East Lake Ohio, we are seeing here in Pennsylvania Like every time we talk on the Phone He tells me what the color of the Object is and that it is heading my way well low and behold I see the very thing that he is seeing they come up along the top of Our Mountain they are Like 3 different colors Reddish white Blueish white and Greenish white Plus we also see the Real Bright Star like Object Not once but so many times that it's getting to also look like a UFO run way and every time we see them they all sneak out of no where every report that I have read on here so far seems to be what we are seeing up here In Pa, I will keep everyone informed on what we are seeing Her in Northumberland County, Pennsylvania also My friends reports as well Off of EastLake, Ohio,
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Shamokin
There were no other sightings in Shamokin on or around September 15th 2008
Summary: Friend from Ohio reported seeing 3 UFO's coming off of Lake
